What is Bitcoin Private $BTCP?

Hard fork of $BTC and $ZCL. $BTCP will have the same privacy technology as ZCL (zk-snarks). Payments are published on a public blockchain, but the sender, recipient, and amount of a transaction remain private.

More info:

https://bitcoinpvt.org
